title: Parsing failure for blank lines in a BED file

content.raw:
Original [issue 11](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=11) created by ericr86 on 2010-09-03T15:56:31.000Z:

If provided with a segmentation containing a blank line, segtools dies with this error message:

    if words[0] == "track":  # Ignore any track lines
IndexError: list index out of range


It should instead say something like "Input file foo.bed is misformatted at line 478.  The line is blank."
content.html:

if words[0] == "track": # Ignore any track lines IndexError: list index out of range

It should instead say something like "Input file foo.bed is misformatted at line 478. The line is blank."
